slides.script: I forgot my anniversary. Again. My wife was furious, but I couldn't help it. Stress and anxiety were taking over my life.
slides.image_prompt: A stressed man sitting on a couch with his head in his hands, a calendar with a circled date in the background, ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format
